text: [[b]]%+n[[/b]] embers

Unlocked technology "Pardon Old-Regime Supports" from the start:\\n\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Enlightenment\\n\\nUnlocks unit through Technology:\\n[[b]]Guardians of the Land[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Heavy assault infantry[[/col]]\\n\\nRole: frontline\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Good armour\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Good in melee\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]] Armoured former palace guards who use ji polearms raided from their previous masters in the fight for the Great Peace.[[/col]][[/i]]\\n\\nUnlocks unit through Technology:\\n\\n[[b]]Stalwart Shields[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Heavy spear infantry[[/col]]\\n\\nRole: anti-cavalry\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Good morale\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Missile defence\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]] The Yellow Turbans must be sword and shield both, holding back the tide of corruption whilst simultaneously pushing it back.[[/col]][[/i]]

Unlocked technology "Call for Warriors" from the start:\\n\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Enlightenment\\n\\nUnlocks unit through Technology:\\n[[b]]Youxia[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Heavy assault infantry[[/col]]\\n\\nRole: frontline\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Good armour\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Guerrilla deployment\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]] With a tally of many victories between them, this armoured infantry form the vanguard of the frontline with sword and shield. [[/col]][[/i]]\\n\\nUnlocks unit through Technology:\\n[[b]]Jiazi Raiders[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Heavy sword cavalry[[/col]]\\n\\nRole: all-rounder\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Good armour\\n[[col:red]]-[[/col]] Small unit\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]] When you fight to live, you tend to become exceedingly good at it.[[/col]][[/i]]

Unlocked technology "Archer's Discipline" from the start:\\n\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Enlightenment\\n\\nUnlocks unit through Technology:\\n[[b]]Archery Masters[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Archer infantry[[/col]]\\n\\nRole: suppression\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Missile attack\\n[[col:red]]-[[/col]] Poor in melee\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]] Archers with an unerring eye; their arrows rarely miss their targets.[[/col]][[/i]]\\n\\nUnlocks unit through Technology:\\n[[b]]The Land's Chosen[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Archer infantry[[/col]]\\n\\nRole: rear line\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Missile attack\\n[[col:red]]-[[/col]] Weak against cavalry\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]] Nature must be preserved and the world saved. These warriors will see it done.[[/col]][[/i]]
He Yi's Population reduces recruitment cost in local {{tr:map_provinces}}

The [[b]]embers[[/b]] resource is shared between you and other [[b]]Yellow Turban[[/b]] factions. Each of you feed into the resource.\\n\\nThe bonuses received are individual.
This increases the [[b]]movement extent[[/b]] that armies can move each turn.
[[b]]Funds[[/b]] are gained as loot after victorious battles.
[[b]]Gong Du[[/b]] earns [[b]]embers[[/b]] from inflicting casualties on enemies in battle.\\n\\nThe amount is greater if you score a victory in the process.
[[b]]embers[[/b]] will decrease over time, causing penalties at lower levels.
The [[b]]embers[[/b]] resource is shared between you and other [[b]]Yellow Turban[[/b]] factions. Each of you feed into the resource.\\n\\nThe bonuses received are individual.
[[b]]Population[[/b]] are the citizens in your settlements and commanderies. They are a primary driver for your [[b]]economy[[/b]] and [[b]]replenishment[[/b]] of military armies.
Units that recover lost men are [[b]]replenishing[[/b]]. This typically happens every turn.
[[b]]He Yi[[/b]] earns [[b]]embers[[/b]] from the size of populations.\\n\\nAdditionally, He Yi's settlements give recruitment cost reduction based on population size.
[[b]]embers[[/b]] will decrease over time, causing penalties at lower levels.
The [[b]]embers[[/b]] resource is shared between you and other [[b]]Yellow Turban[[/b]] factions. Each of you feed into the resource.\\n\\nThe bonuses received are individual.
Characters increase their [[b]]rank[[/b]] by accumulating [[b]]experience[[/b]] through military and civic activities.
Yellow Turban factions can [[b]]research[[/b]] reforms at varying speed. The higher the [[b]]research rate[[/b]], the higher the frequency at which new reforms can be chosen.
[[b]]Huang Shao[[/b]] earns [[b]]embers[[/b]] from researching reforms.
[[b]]embers[[/b]] will decrease over time, causing penalties at lower levels.

The yellow turban cause has failed.
They speak of our message, and some join us, but many remain wary and afraid.
They hear our words and understand. More have come to join us, and spread the word to others.
Our reach is great and many come to follow us.
The Yellow Sky looms large - followers flock to us in droves!
